name: 2024 7th International Conference on Frontiers of Image Processing
content: PUBLICATION: Submissions will be peer reviewed by both the conference scientific committees and JOIG editorial board, and accepted papers will be published in Journal of Image and Graphics Journal of Image and Graphics (ISSN:2301-3699) indexed by Scopus (Since 2021), CNKI, Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc.
